actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for labor certification on an areawide, rather than on a countrywide, basis for admittance of temporary agricultural laborers.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for labor certification on an areawide, rather than on a countrywide, basis for admitting temporary agricultural workers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for labor certification on an areawide, rather than on a countrywide, basis for admittance of temporary agricultural laborers.
